title: Steve's $1 Million Dollars, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Tiffany Haddish, Rev. Adnoid, Sexlationship, Viral Dance, Weekend Confessions, Morning Inspiration and more.
itunes:title: Steve's $1 Million Dollars, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Tiffany Haddish, Rev. Adnoid, Sexlationship, Viral Dance, Weekend Confessions, Morning Inspiration and more.
description:
Steve is giving away $1 million dollars. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Tiffany Haddish gets her wish from Madea. Rev. Adnoid does Church Complaints and Announcements. SBL has a sexlationship in it. Plus we test Tommy's knowledge and get him ready for his challenge.
